card_text: Target 1 "Decode Talker" you control; apply the following effects this turn, depending on the number of monsters it currently points to.$N●1+: That monster gains 500 ATK for each monster it currently points to.$N●2+: Monsters destroyed by battle with that monster are banished after damage calculation.$N●3: After damage calculation, if that monster destroys your opponent's monster by battle: Destroy all cards your opponent controls.$NYou can only activate 1 "Decode Destruction" per turn.
